src:
„Armejci“ trojkama pokorili Sankt Peterburg
01 Nov 2019, 20:09 by Darko
Zenit – CSKA 70:87 (15:26, 22:22, 22:13, 11:26)
Ruski duel u 6. kolu Evrolige pripao je košarkašima CSKA iz Moskve. „Armejci“ su uz manje oscilacije bili bolji od Zenita na gostovanju u Santk Peterburgu i stigli do pete evroligaške pobede ove sezone.
CSKA je kontrolisao meč od prve četvrtine pa sve do sredine trećeg perioda. Tada je Zenit serijom od 15:0 stigao do izjednačenja (51:51) i zapretio da bi mogao nešto više da učini u završnici utakmice.
Ipak, serija od 12:0 CSKA u kojoj su Majk Džejms i Darun Hilijard postigli po dve trojkena početku poslednje deonice, definitivno je rešila pitanje pobednika.
Ekipa iz Moskve je na kraju imala odličan šut za tri poena (16/33), što joj je, uz kontrolu skoka (28:22), bilo dovoljno za trijumf.
Najefikasniji kod „armejaca“ bili su Majk Džejms sa 16, Johanes Fojgtman sa 14, te Darun Hilijard i Nikita Kurbanov sa po 13 poena.
U Zenitu, koji ostaje na dve pobede posle 5. kola Vil Tomas je postigao 14, a Ostin Holins 13 poena.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
The Armeis conquered the Troika St. Petersburg
01 Nov 2019, 19:09 by Darko
Zenit - CSKA 70:87 (15:26, 22:22, 22:13, 11:26)
The Russian duel in the 6th round of the Euroleague went to CSKA basketball players from Moscow. With less oscillation, the Armeis were better than Zenit on a visit to St. Petersburg and reached their fifth Euroleague victory of the season.
CSKA controlled the match from the first quarter to the middle of the third period. Then Zenit reached the equalizer (51:51) with a 15-0 run and threatened to do something more in the final of the game.
However, the 12-0 CSKA series, in which Mike James and Darun Hilliard scored two triples each at the start of the last leg, definitely solved the winner.
The Moscow team eventually had a great three-point shot (16/33), which, with the rebound control (28:22), was enough for the triumph.
The most effective of the "Armeis" were Mike James with 16, Johannes Foygtman with 14, and Darun Hilliard and Nikita Kurbanov with 13 points each.
At Zenit, which remains on two wins after round 5, Will Thomas scored 14 and Austin Hollins 13 points.
